marklogic.body:
Those are both very good points. I have added them to the post. The instructions actually say that that you should add a few drops of chlorine bleach to the water and run it through the filter before long term storage.
As far as freezing, it is a big issue during winter, but it is the same problem for ceramic filters like the MSR Miniworks EX. I Always carry an insulative cover during winter. I don't know of a good solution to the problem. If there isn't enough snow everywhere to just melt for water, some sort of filtration has to be done as chemical treatments have a very hard time int he Cold.
